resources.string: This is a updater for multiple browsers from Mozilla. Click the plus-button for installation and the down-arrow-button for updating. By down-swiping or reopening the app you can check for new updates. On default the app will check regularly for updates in the background. I did my best to secure the installation/updating process - feel free to double-check it or improve it by creating a pull-request.
This notification category will inform you about new available Firefox updates.
This app is designed for developers and testers of Mozilla Firefox. It may contain various bugs that can affect your usual work with the browser. Do you really want to install this app?
This app is designed for testers and therefore it contains some trackers. Do you really want to install this app?
Failed to fetch the download url from %1$s

Either an attacker replace the correct download with a tampered one or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug.

Either a tampered application is installed or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug.\n\nI recommend you to uninstall the application.
This is the default and well-known Firefox browser from Mozilla.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from the official Mozilla API.

This app is a prerelease of the Firefox browser and is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that affect your usual work with the browser.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from the official Mozilla API.

This app is a bleeding edge release of the Firefox browser and is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that affect your usual work with the browser.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from the official Mozilla API.

This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy. Firefox Klar is for Germany, Switzerland and Austria and almost identical to Firefox Focus. Only the name was change to avoid confusion with the magazine \'Focus\'.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from Github - only updates which are released on Github can be downloaded.
This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from Github - only updates which are released on Github can be downloaded.

Firefox Lite is primary developed for users in Indonesia. The app is very small and supports techniques to reduce (mobile) data consumption.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from Github - only updates which are released on Github can be downloaded.

\'Firefox Preview (internal code name: \'Fenix\') is an all-new browser for Android\'. This app is currently under development and contains more trackers than usual to analyse/improve the app usage.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from Github - only updates which are released on Github can be downloaded.
The selected browser is incompatible with your smartphone\'s processor. Please select a different browser.
The application requires Android %1$s. But your device is only running Android %2$s. Either choose a different app, update your operating system or switch to a newer smartphone.
